author: Journal Inquirer Staff
title: Ellington defense stymies Valley Regional
text:
Ellington defense stymies Valley Regional By Journal Inquirer Staff Journal Inquirer | 0 comments 
The Ellington High football team continued its defensive dominance in the Pequot League by holding Valley Regional to just 124 yards of offense in a convincing victory Friday night. 
Ellington blanked visiting Valley Regional of Deep River 24-0. 
It was the Purple Knights’ second shutout of the season. They blanked Windsor Locks/Suffield/East Granby in the season opener Sept. 12. kAm~776?D:G6=J[ !FCA=6 z?:89ED’ BF2CE6C324< r9C:DE:2? #:56C FD65 9:D 5F2= E9C62E 23:=:EJ E@ 42CG6 FA E96 {6H:D |:==D 5676?D6 7@C ed J2C5D E9C@F89 E96 2:C 2?5 2?@E96C ad @?
